## TokenModule.mintBatchTo() method

Mint Tokens To Many Wallets

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
mintBatchTo(args: ITokenMintArgs[]): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  args | [ITokenMintArgs](./sdk.itokenmintargs.md)<!-- -->\[\] |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;

## Remarks

Mint tokens to many different wallets

## Example


```javascript
// Data of the tokens you want to mint
const data = [
  {
    address: "{{wallet_address}}", // Address to mint tokens to
    amount: 100, // How many tokens to mint to specified address
  },
 {
   address: "0x...",
   amount: 100,
 }
]

await module.transfer(toAddress, amount);
```
